name: Found Sound (griefdrips)
description:
“Found Sound” is a “Moonshot” in two ways. Our hero Foley’s moonshot is his quest to create music out of his weird & chaotic surroundings. He must overcome several obstacles in order to add his own unique spin on the world he inhabits.

On a more literal level, only one member of our team had ever attempted designing a video game before, let alone an extremely ambitious one that includes an immersive world with over 10 unique characters, 4 original songs, and tons of original code. This project is, in and of itself, a moonshot by a team who has never worked together. We think JFK would be proud!
